page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT in Blindcrake
page.content:
Farming is the main employment in the area with about thirty people involved. Following closely is the Quarry although no locals (ie people living in this block) are employed. Other occupations are: Carpenter Council Workers Speech Therapist National Trust Joiner Delivery Service Teachers Transport Manager Architect Lorry Driver Social Workers Research Worker Lecturer Relief Nurse Model Maker Builder Librarian School Cook Health Visitor Publican
There are also about 30 retired people
